title: April fools - isnt that normally when urf (or some other fun mode) launches?

replies.body: thank fucking god they're not launching it this year.
Why would you not want it?
But lol kinda a boring and when one team winning  THERE REALLY WINNING and there was no toxic talk during URF

> [{quoted}](name=crazyhead,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iTh54q6O,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T06:31:19.677+0000)
>
> But lol kinda a boring and when one team winning  THERE REALLY WINNING and there was no toxic talk during URF

they're might've been not toxic chat during urf, but the whole mode was cancerous.
with every man and his fucking dog picking ez, sona, hec, soraka, nidalee, it was a complete cancer fest.
you want to have fun? good luck doing that whilst getting your shit pushed in by the most bullshit champs.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r9D7Mnek85I what the fuck do you mean no toxicity during urf, just look at this
But they are launching it, just not for april fools.
ONLY TWICE THIS YEAR AND ONLY ON WEEKENDS SO 4-6  DAYS SO IT'S STRAIGHT BS
It's better than if they decided to do away with it altogether, so there's that. And besides, it's not a big issue. It starts to get boring after the first few days anyway.
for you you know that's the only thing LOL has which i love now its been rip apart
keep up they changed it for everything appear atleast 6-10 times a year.
its draven party for april fools
